news.title: Foreign interference or opportunistic grifting: why are so many pro-Trump X accounts based in Asia?
news.summary: X rolled out a new feature revealing the locations of popular accounts. The company was acting to boost transparency and clamp down on disinformation. The result has been a circular firing squad of recriminations.

news.title: Don’t buy new tech this Black Friday: expert tips for buying refurbished phones and laptops
news.summary: It’s hard to escape the noise of retailers offering implausible-seeming Black Friday discounts on desirable technology. What they won’t be so keen to highlight is the huge environmental cost that comes from feeding the capitalist beast year on year. While the best approach for the planet is to opt out completely and observe the alternate holiday of Buy Nothing Day instead.
